summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Campus Lost & Found Management System. All backend APIs working (100% success rate), frontend UI fully functional with proper college branding, admin/student login systems working, and all major features accessible.
passed_tests: Backend API health checks (17/17 tests passed)
Super admin login with credentials superadmin/SuperAdmin@123
Public landing page with college branding and search functionality
Admin dashboard with all stats cards displaying correctly
Student login page with Roll Number and DOB fields
Admin navigation to all sections (Lost Items, Found Items, AI Matches, Claims, Students, Messages, Deleted Items, Settings)
Super admin access to Manage Admins page
Password change functionality in admin settings
Excel upload functionality for student management
Public items API returning found items
Proper empty states for fresh installation (no students, claims, items)
AI matching system showing appropriate message when no items to match
